To Governor
Title
Maryland Online Data Privacy Act of 2024
Sponsored by
Senators Gile, Hester, Augustine, Feldman, Beidle, and Ellis
Status
Approved by the Governor - Chapter 455
Analysis
Fiscal and Policy Note (Revised)
Synopsis
Regulating the manner in which a controller or a processor in possession of a consumer's personal data may process the consumer's personal data; authorizing a consumer to exercise certain rights in regards to the consumer's personal data; requiring a controller of personal data to establish a method for a consumer to exercise certain rights in regards to the consumer's personal data; requiring a controller to comply with a consumer's request to exercise a certain right in a certain manner, except under certain circumstances; etc.

Effective Date(s): October 1, 2025

Helpful Tools
  • Download Legislative Data
    Open Legislative Data Download
    You are about to download a "comma-separated values" (CSV) file and/or a JSON file.
    The file includes information such as number, sponsor, title, legislative status, synopsis, committee assignments, legislative history, hearing dates, etc for each piece of legislation introduced during the selected legislative session.
    A word about the file format: CSV and JSON files are common file formats, widely supported by consumer and business applications and is used to move data between programs. The file you download can be imported into Excel, a text editor, browser, or any other application that supports the CSV and JSON formats. To save, right-click button and save as desired file format.

readabilityObject.title: Legislation - SB0541
readabilityObject.content:
Synopsis

Regulating the manner in which a controller or a processor in possession of a consumer's personal data may process the consumer's personal data; authorizing a consumer to exercise certain rights in regards to the consumer's personal data; requiring a controller of personal data to establish a method for a consumer to exercise certain rights in regards to the consumer's personal data; requiring a controller to comply with a consumer's request to exercise a certain right in a certain manner, except under certain circumstances; etc.

Details

Effective Date(s): October 1, 2025

(   13-301,   14-4601 through 14-4614 )
readabilityObject.textContent:
Synopsis

                                Details
                                
                                                
Effective Date(s): October 1, 2025
